reviewtext: As expected with any CCD, mine got a hospot burned into the image where the sun hit the camera at the same point every afternoon (I have it watching my front pasture). I have since adjusted the position.ALSO: A lot of the software included is actually DEMO versions and if you want to use them for more than just play you either have to go buy the full version or hack around your setup to work aroung the limits of the demo version (this seems to be a common, but still misleading, way all the cam manufactures bundle the software with their webcams.
